data.text: @DrAquinoSays @ActionNewsJax And do you think you'll be able to defend these POVs in 3 months?  6?  12?  I merely pointed out your use of anti-science in your headline. I'm not sure you can defend that any more than MDs can now defend cloth masks.

@DrAquinoSays @ActionNewsJax This is the same AAP that recommends masking children in school and toddlers in pre-school. Social development be damned.  Mental health be damned.  Are you sure you want to quote this organization?

@DrAquinoSays @ActionNewsJax You're parroting lines, not providing data.  Nor did you address WHO or anti-science western Europe. The APA doesn't represent all pediatricians and they, too, have not provided data.  Again, this puts the credibility of your profession at risk.

@bullystixx @ActionNewsJax The American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) :
…recommends COVID-19 vaccination for all children and adolescents 5 years of age and older who do not have contraindications…

@Katscub55 @ActionNewsJax I 💜 medicine/science bcz it makes sense.  I never thought I’d see the day where politics got so wrapped up in medicine.  I thought abortion was the only topic that occurred with.  I was naive🤦🏽‍♀️.

@DrAquinoSays @ActionNewsJax Pretty loaded headline on not following the science. Is the WHO and many countries in Western Europe not following the science?  Data please.  Me thinks you don't have that.
